mapper.select: select farmname,farmprofile from farm where storenum=(select storenum from seller where userid=(select userid from product where productnum=#{param1}))
select o.productnum, p.productprice, o.optionprice, o.optionnum, o.optionnowstock, o.optionname from optiontbl o join product p on p.productnum = o.productnum where p.productnum =#{param1}
select nvl(saleprice,0) as saleprice from product p left join discount d on d.productnum = p.productnum where p.productnum=#{param1}
select optionnum from option where optionnum=${param1}
select count(reviewnum) totalRecord from review where productnum=${productnum}
select count(qnum) totalRecord from userqboard where productnum=${productnum}
select count(*) from wish where userid=#{userid}
select reviewnum,reviewimg,reviewcontent,userid,to_char(reviewwritedate,'MM-DD HH:MI')reviewwritedate,reviewscore from review where productnum=${param1} and reviewnum=${param2}

select * from( select * from( select distinct nvl(d.saleprice,0)saleprice,w.userid, w.productnum as productnum, w.optionnum,nvl(o.optionname,' ')optionname, w.wishnum, w.wishoptionnum, p.productname, p.productprice, p.thumbimg,p.optionselect, to_char(p.productcontent) as productcontent, o.optionprice from wish w left join product p on p.productnum = w.productnum left join optiontbl o on w.optionnum = o.optionnum left join discount d on w.productnum = d.productnum where w.userid = #{userid} order by w.productnum) where rownum<=${pageNum}*${onePageRecord} order by productnum desc) where rownum<=${lastPageRecord} ${onePageRecord} order by productnum asc
